content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Station at (-15, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) containing 209 coal

### Iron Mining Station at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0) mining iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 158 iron ore

### Iron Smelting Line
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0)
Both furnaces have 23 coal as fuel but no ingredients

### Copper Processing Complex at (20-24, 17-21)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) mining copper ore
- Collection chest at (20.5, 21.5) containing 208 copper ore
- Secondary chest at (22.5, 21.5) containing 397 copper ore
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0) with 40 coal fuel
- Output chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing 53 copper plates
- Two burner inserters:
  - One at (24.5, 18.5) moving items between furnace and output chest
  - One at (22.5, 20.5) moving items between input chest and furnace

ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Orientation Issues
- Ensure inserter pickup and drop positions are correctly aligned with source and destination entities
- When placing inserters, verify the direction allows proper movement of materials between connected entities

### Resource Flow Issues
- Despite having copper ore in input chests (397 + 208), furnaces show NO_INGREDIENTS status
- Check if inserters are properly oriented to move materials from chests to furnaces
- Ensure there is sufficient space in destination inventories (note "chest is full" warning)

### Fuel Management
- Some mining drills are running out of fuel ("out of fuel" warning)
- Implement a fuel distribution system to keep all burner entities consistently supplied with coal
